application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - a) Method statement for the repair and restoration of historic plasterwork to the ground floor; b) details of all new service runs) of Listed Building consent LB/24/08017 (Proposed interior works to Flats 2, 3, 4, 6 and 7 involving: Removal of newer partition in Flat 2 and restoration and reinstatement of original ceiling and wall features along with original ceiling footprint. Creation of a distinct contemporary Pod-like furniture. Works on Flats 3, 4, 6 and 7 involve removal of newer corner cupboard additions, reinstatement of original ceiling outline and features, removal of newer spotlights and creation of contemporary Pod-like furniture, to allow creation of a new single bedroom)
